assignments.name: Set_ODA_Amount_That_Accrues_Interest
assignments.label: Set ODA Amount That Accrues Interest

decisions.description: Checks whether the user entered the amount or not to continue flow or end.
decisions.name: Amount_Entered2
decisions.label: Amount Entered?

decisions.description: vAmountsDueAccrueInterest, passed from the button logic on the ODA, is NOT null.
decisions.name: Amounts_Due_That_Accrue_Interest_Not_Null
decisions.label: Amounts Due That Accrue Interest Not Null?

decisions.description: Checks the object type passed from the VFP parameter
decisions.name: Called_From_ODA_or_Settlement
decisions.label: Called From ODA or Settlement?

decisions.description: Object type passed from VFP parameters: Liability, ODA (with Meeting), or Settlement.
decisions.name: Called_From_Which_Object
decisions.label: Called From Which Object?

Flow.description: Creates a Judgment from a Liability, ODA, or Settlement.

formulas.description: Changes the text value of the amount that accrues interest to a currency for calculation
formulas.name: flaAmtAccruesInterestCurr

formulas.description: Judgement Amount = Total Penalties Assesses + Total Wage Assessed + Total Interest Assessed
formulas.name: flaJeuRciJudgmentAmount

formulas.description: Uses the object type as input to define the value for the Judgment Type field on the judgment
formulas.name: flaJudgmentType

formulas.description: To assign the Judgment Mail Date to Today
formulas.name: Today

Flow.label: Judgment Create

recordLookups.description: Query this info to get an actual currency value
recordLookups.name: Query_ODA_Amount_That_Accrues_Interest
recordLookups.label: Query ODA Amount That Accrues Interest

recordUpdates.description: Updates the ODA to set the amount that accrues interest entered on the previous screen
recordUpdates.name: Update_ODA
recordUpdates.label: Update ODA

screens.name: Ask_For_Mailing_Date_Filing_Fees
screens.label: Ask For Mailing Date, Filing Fees

screens.name: Ask_For_Mailing_Date_Filing_Fees1
screens.label: Ask For Mailing Date, Filing Fees

screens.name: Ask_For_ODA_Amount_That_Accrues_Interest
screens.label: Ask For ODA Amount That Accrues Interest

fields.name: txtRequireAmountForInterest
fields.fieldText:
You must enter an amount in the "ODA Amount that Accrues Interest" field on the ODA before you can create a judgment on this ODA.
If you know this amount, you may enter it now:

fields.name: txtGoBack
fields.fieldText: Otherwise, clicking "Next" will return you to the ODA.

fields.name: scrEnd
fields.fieldText: Click Finish to go to the new Judgment record.

fields.name: txtPartiesToAddError
fields.fieldText: No parties were found to add to the Judgment

fields.name: txtInvalidInputs_0
fields.fieldText:
Unable to create Judgment. Please ensure that the Liability, ODA, or Settlement has been set up correctly, and that Liable Parties have been selected as the settling parties if needed.


Please provide the below information to the support team:

ObjectType: {!vObjectType}

RecordID: {!varRecordId}

CaseID: {!vCaseId}

MeetingId: {!varMeetingID}

fields.name: Test1
fields.fieldText: Click Next to create a Judgment

fields.name: txtUpdateJudgmentFault
fields.fieldText:
A fault occurred attempting to update the judgment in the Judgment Create flow.


The values that were to be updated are:


Judgment Amount : {!vDefaultAmount}

Judgment Mailing date : {!Judgment_Mailing_Date}{!Judgment_Mailing_Date1} from the previous screen

Object : {!varRecordId} the ID of the source {!vObjectType}.

Filing Fees: {!Filing_Fees}{!Filing_Fees1}


Raw Interest Rate: {!vInterestRate}

Interest Rate Formula: {!flaInterestRate}


Post Hearing Interest:

Amounts that accrue interest: {!vAmountsDueAccrueInterest}

JudgmentMailingDate: {!Judgment_Mailing_Date}{!Judgment_Mailing_Date1}

ODA by Settlement Date: {!vODABySettlementDate}


{!vObjectType} Post Hearing Interest formula:

{!flaSettlementPostHearingInterest}{!flaOdaPostHearingInterest}

textTemplates.description: Displays the information that will be updated on the new judgment created from a settlement
textTemplates.name: txtJudgmentUpdateDebug
textTemplates.text: Preparing to update the Judgment {!vJudgmentId} using the values: Judgment Amount : {!vDefaultAmount} from the default amount on the settlement Judgment Mailing date : {!Judgment_Mailing_Date} from the entry screen Settlement : {!varRecordId} the source settlement Status : Open

variables.description: collection of liable parties on the Liablity
variables.name: colLiablityLiableParties

variables.description: collection of liable parties on the ODA
variables.name: colODALiableParties

variables.name: colSettlementPartiestoInsert

variables.description: The Liable Parties from Liablities that need to be inserted as liablity judgement records on the new judgement

variables.description: Liability Judement record to insert into the judgement
variables.name: objLiabilityJudgement

variables.description: Each instance of the liable parties
variables.name: objLiablityLiableParty

variables.description: Instance of the liable party from the collection

variables.description: The Liable Parties from the ODA that need to be inserted as liability judgment records on the new judgment
variables.name: ODAPartiestoInsert

variables.description:
Amounts due that accrue interest for calculating post hearing interest on judgment
For settlement, retrieved by lookup, ODA passed from button.
variables.name: vAmountsDueAccrueInterest

variables.description: Liable party ID from the collection being looped over
variables.name: varLiablePartyID

variables.description: ID of the meeting the ODA was created from. Passed from querystring variable
variables.name: varMeetingID

variables.description: Record ID of the record that started the flow
variables.name: varRecordId

variables.description: ID of the judgment created during the flow. Passed back in flow interview to set the finish location.
variables.name: vJudgmentId

variables.description: values passed from the vfp defining the object that started the flow
variables.name: vObjectType
